module.name: Outbound Call Limit
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php - Restrict Outbound Calls at an outbound route level
module.changelog: 2.11.0.10 Fix view issues when unlicensed 2.11.0.9 Sales Cleanup 2.11.0.6 Fix issue where calllimit_usage wasn't be created on new install 2.11.0.5 Bump to force module to install 2.11.0.4 Fix potential issue with more than 10 groups. 2.11.0.3 Make default recording play. 2.11.0.2 Add ability to define more then 1 rule 2.11.0.1 Push for 2.11 2.10.0.8 re #1711 - 2.10.0.7 Packaging of ver 2.10.0.7 2.10.0.6 re #1472 - #1427 2.10.0.5 re #1392 - 2.10.0.4 re #1392 -
